attributes.action: encourage the creation of charity taxworkers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long charities have been the open holes of tax swindling criminal underworld type peoples. I hearby propose that councils appoint charity taxworkers to remove half the charities earnings at will.
due to the excessive stress involved in denying impoverished children the food that others donate, fifty percent of the taxes should go to the workers
